name: Emercury for Gravity Forms
author: Emercury

sections.description: Collect more mailing list subscribers with the Emercury for Gravity Forms plugin! Directly integrate all of your forms with Emercury to collect more mailing list subscribers and push your email marketing to the next level.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to Emercury Settings section and enter the data for the Emercury API Settings.
  4. You are done!
